markdownRemark.html:
We don’t choose our parents. Most people haven’t reflected on the fact that being born to this world is not of our own choosing. Okay, religious people will credit a “creator” but I hate to break it but there is no God or Allah or even Buddah. I hope I can capture my deep appreciation of life and how I made sense of it in this blog post.

I was born to a poor family in San Ildefonso, a town two hours from Manila, our nation’s Capital in 1985. If I were to have a hand in my fate as to where I should start this life of sacrifice and struggle I wouldn’t choose a developing country hampered by corruption and social turmoil.
